text: wafi al'ard qitae yjawr bedha bedana, minha ma hu tyib yunbt ma yanfae alnas, waminha sabikht milht la tunbt shyyana, wafi al'ard altayibat basatin min aenab, wajaeal fiha zrweana mukhtalifat wnkhyla mjtmeana fi mnbt wahd, waghayr mujtamae fyh, kl dhlk fi turbat wahdt, wayashrab min maa' wahd, wlknh yakhtalif fi althimar walhjm waltem waghayr dhlk, fhdha hlw whdha hamd, wbedha 'afdal min bed fi alakl, 'iina fi dhalik laelamat liman kan lah qalb yaeqil ean allah taealaa 'amrih wnhyh
